text: P. Miles Bryson was born in August 1964, and is a collage and sound artist residing in Arizona. He has released music on a variety of music labels such as Illegal Art, Self Abuse, genesungswerk, SSSM, Cynfeirdd, Anaemic Waves Factory, and 6 on the dot. Releases include Long Day's Tango Into Night and Alejandro's Carniceria. == References == == External links == * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Arizona
title: P. Miles Bryson
